page.title: 03TRADE -SHOPPING TRENDS
page.content: Flimby has quite a number of shops for its size.Seaton has about 16.This is only because it is a large village. Siddick has 1 shop.In all of these places the people go to the village shops just for odd things like bread, beans and sugar etc.The weekly shopping that they get is from big shops in the towns.They usually go to Workington because it is cheap.They go to big shops like the Co.op Superstore or Marks and Spencer.The people go clothes shopping in Carlisle or big clothes shops in Workington.Maryport is a quite expensive town.That is why most people go to Workington.Carlisle is the largest town in the area.That has got places like The Lanes and a very large Marks and Spencer.
